sentences.en: All of these values should already be set for you when you imported the project interchange file for this article.
sentences.cn: 在您导入本文中的项目交换文件时，所有这些值都应该已经设置好了。

sentences.en: Any interchange will be governed by the conservation of energy.
sentences.cn: 任何交换过程都要服从能量守恒.

sentences.en: Continued interchange of genes will counteract the effects of selection.
sentences.cn: 连续的基因交换将抵消选择的效果.

sentences.en: For identical data difference interchange coefficients will be obtained.
sentences.cn: 对同一数据来说,将得到了不同的交换系数.

sentences.en: In fact, you can bring the results into SQL queries again if you so wish because DB2 can interchange the languages with DB2.
sentences.cn: 实际上，如果您愿意，也可以使用 SQL 查询得到同样的结果，因为在 DB2 中这两种语言可以互换。

sentences.en: Keywords: supply chain management, inter - organizational systems, electronic data interchange, automotive industry.
sentences.cn: 关键字: 供给连锁管理, 国际组织化系统, 电子资料交换系统, 机动工业.

sentences.en: Save and export the project by using the project interchange mechanism.
sentences.cn: 通过使用项目交换机理来保存和导出项目。

sentences.en: She likes to interchange her furnishings at home with the stock in her shop.
sentences.cn: 她想要把家里的家具与店里的存货调换一下。

sentences.en: Terminal change to Tseung Kwan O MTR Station Public Transport Interchange.
sentences.cn: 总站迁往将军澳地铁站公共交通交汇处.

sentences.en: The discussion went over the ground already covered in the interchange of telegrams.
sentences.cn: 讨论转入往来电报中所涉及的问题.

sentences.en: The interchange of ideas aids an understanding of family dynamics.
sentences.cn: 思想的交流有助于理解家庭动态。

sentences.en: The interchange of ideas illumines the debate.
sentences.cn: 思想的交锋使辩论熠熠生辉。

sentences.en: The modification required is to interchange the offending column with a suitable column to the right.
sentences.cn: 需要调整的是把这引起麻烦的一列与其右边适当一列交换.

sentences.en: There is much interchange of foods between different regions.
sentences.cn: 在各个地区间食物能得以广泛地交流.

sentences.en: This is the subway interchange station.
What made the meeting exciting was the interchange of ideas from different disciplines.
sentences.cn: 会议上令人兴奋的是来自不同学科的思想交流。

sentences.en: Your task is to interchange words so that the sentence makes sense.
sentences.cn: 你们要做的就是调换单词的位置以使句子意义通顺。

words.tran_cn: 可互换的；可交换的；可交替的
相互联系，相互沟通；互相联络

phrases.tran_cn: 联运车辆交接站，交汇站；接驳点

trans.tran_cn: 交换，交替，互通式立体交叉，道路立体枢纽
trans.tran_en: an exchange, especially of ideas or thoughts
to put each of two things in the place of the other, or to be exchanged in this way（

trans.tran_cn: 互换，交换，交替（位置等），使更叠发生，交替发生
